Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class ValidationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.ValidationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidationServiceInterface
@Service public class ValidationServiceImpl extends Object implements ValidationServiceInterface
Implementation of the ValidationServiceInterface, providing various validation services.

This service orchestrates the validation of comments, likes, media, and users by delegating the validation logic to respective service classes: CommentValidationServiceImpl, LikeValidationServiceImpl, MediaValidationServiceImpl, and UserValidationServiceImpl.

It is used to validate all aspects of a post before performing operations such as creation or update.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Constructor Details

    • ValidationServiceImpl

      public ValidationServiceImpl(CommentValidationServiceImpl commentValidationServiceImpl, LikeValidationServiceImpl likeValidationServiceImpl, MediaValidationServiceImpl mediaValidationServiceImpl, UserValidationServiceImpl userValidationServiceImpl)
      Constructs a new ValidationServiceImpl with the specified validation service dependencies.

      The constructor injects dependencies for comment, like, media, and user validation services, which are used to validate different aspects of a post.

      Parameters:
      commentValidationServiceImpl - the CommentValidationServiceImpl for comment validation
      likeValidationServiceImpl - the LikeValidationServiceImpl for like validation
      mediaValidationServiceImpl - the MediaValidationServiceImpl for media validation
      userValidationServiceImpl - the UserValidationServiceImpl for user validation

  • Method Details

    • validateComment

      public Long validateComment(Long postId)
      Validates the comments associated with a given post.

      This method delegates to CommentValidationServiceImpl to count the comments for the post with the specified ID.

      Specified by:
      validateComment in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to validate comments
      Returns:
      the count of comments associated with the post

    • validateLike

      public Long validateLike(Long postId)
      Validates the likes associated with a given post.

      This method delegates to LikeValidationServiceImpl to count the likes for the post with the specified ID.

      Specified by:
      validateLike in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to validate likes
      Returns:
      the count of likes associated with the post

    • validateMedia

      public void validateMedia(CreatePostDTO createPostDTO)
      Validates the media associated with a post.

      This method delegates to MediaValidationServiceImpl to check whether the media for the post is valid.

      Specified by:
      validateMedia in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createPostDTO - the CreatePostDTO object containing the media information to validate

    • validateUser

      public void validateUser(CreatePostDTO createPostDTO)
      Validates the user associated with a post.

      This method delegates to UserValidationServiceImpl to verify that the user exists.

      Specified by:
      validateUser in interface ValidationServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      createPostDTO - the CreatePostDTO object containing the user ID to validate
